channel.title: Zeneko - Individual (Indirect Remix) (drum and bass)
channel.description:
Hey everyone! THis is probably my first official try in the drum and bass genre. Please take a listen and let me know what you think! Original song by @Lex
https://soundcloud.com/indir3ct/zeneko-individual-indir3ct

item.title: Zeneko - Individual (Indirect Remix) (drum and bass)
item.dc:creator: INDIR3CT
item.description:
Thanks for your feedback man! I was really torn figuring out what genre to classify it lol! The Tempo was set to 182, so standard DnB beats sounded wieeerd. So I went with a more fast paced trap style beat.

Read full topic

item.title: Zeneko - Individual (Indirect Remix) (drum and bass)
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Ok cool, listening to the original helps put this in context! INDIR3CT I like your treatment of this. The original has (to me) some strong melodic content so it’s good to hear it maintained

After listening to both again I don’t really hear the drum and bass part of this, but genre nitpicking aside it’s solid, introspective.

Read full topic

item.title: Zeneko - Individual (Indirect Remix) (drum and bass)
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
It’s very thick, I like it, but I’m not sure where the DnB at

I think the tempo seems right, it’s hard to tell. It’s a simple but strong melody, IMO those are usually the best

What does the original sound like?

Read full topic
